name: Nelson
description:
Made for the Ludum Dare, Nelson is the perfect blend of action and adventure. Your character : Nelson, is the head repair man for Timeco time machines. On one of his routine checkups of Timeco's newest product: The Handheld, he notices something just isn't right, so naturally, he investigates. He is immediately thrown into a random time in human history. With the help of his trusty blaster, Nelson will have to fight his way back from  own time period. Have fun, and happy blasting!

Info:"Nelson" is a top-down, retro adventure type game that involves a man, and a broken time machine. We made this for the Ludum Dare in 3 days.
We are planning on updating this for quite a while. We are aware it has a few bugs, and is pretty small right now, But it won't stay that way!

New Update Coming Soon!
